org.openscience.cdk.renderer.elements

Class Bounds

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openscience.cdk.renderer.elements.Bounds
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IRenderingElement

    @TestClass(value="org.openscience.cdk.renderer.elements.BoundingBoxTest")
public final class Bounds
extends Object
implements IRenderingElement
    Defines a bound box element which the renderer can use to determine the true drawing limits. Using only atom coordinates adjuncts (e.g. hydrogen labels) may be truncated. If a generator provide a bounding box element, then the min/max bounds of all bounding boxes are utilised.
    Author:
    John May
    Source code:
    master
    Belongs to CDK module:
    renderbasic
